snippet: Drayton McLane Jr., who went to Baylor and Michigan State and donated money for stadiums that bear his name on both campuses, said he “never dreamed” the universities would meet in a bowl game.
abstract: Cotton Bowl contenders Michigan State University and Baylor University both claim Texas billionaire Draton McLane Jr as an alumnus and both have stadium named after him.
lead_paragraph: Drayton McLane Jr., who went to Baylor and Michigan State and donated money for stadiums that bear his name on both campuses, said he “never dreamed” the universities would meet in a bowl game.

headline.seo: Baylor and Michigan State Face Off in Cotton Bowl, and a Benefactor Is Torn
headline.main: Alluring Matchup in Cotton Bowl Has One Man’s Name Written All Over It
headline.print_headline: Alluring Matchup in Cotton Bowl Has One Man’s Name Written All Over It
